Source: Values highlighted red were overridden locally on load and may differ from the server values.
en-us: Values highlighted red were overridden locally on load and may differ from the server values.

Source: No local overrides were found on load. All values shown match the server values.
en-us: No local overrides were found on load. All values shown match the server values.

Source: Save changes to the current Studio build.
en-us: Save changes to the current Studio build.

Source: Exports all current overrides to a portable ClientAppSettings.json file.
en-us: Exports all current overrides to a portable ClientAppSettings.json file.

Source: Saves and immediately applies overrides to running studio instance (unsafe).
en-us: Saves and immediately applies overrides to running studio instance (unsafe).

Source: Flag overrides changes have been applied dynamically, studio behavior may be unstable until the next restart.
en-us: Flag overrides changes have been applied dynamically, studio behavior may be unstable until the next restart.

Source:
Error: Could not export overrides.
There was an error opening the json file for writing. Check Studio logs for more details.
en-us:
Error: Could not export overrides.
There was an error opening the json file for writing. Check Studio logs for more details.

Source: Unable to save. Try running RobloxStudio with admin permission.
en-us: Unable to save. Try running RobloxStudio with admin permission.

Context: Button displayed in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor). Button is used to add a new entry to the list of flag overrides by opening a new dialog.
Button displayed in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor). Button is used to remove the currently selected entry in the list of flag overrides.
Button displayed in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor). Button is used to remove all entries from the list of flag overrides.
Title of Add Override dialog that appears after clicking add button in the Overrides tab of the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
The name of a flag in the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
The type of a flag (FFlag, FLog, DFString, etc.) in the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
The value of a flag in the Flag Editor (File -> Advanced -> Open Flag Editor).
NOTE TO LOCALIZERS: Do not translate the parentheses (), whatever is inside the parentheses, or any other special characters, use ASCII instead.
